extendedInfo.description: 4D Anatomy allows viewers to understand and interact with complex information with unprecedented ease, speed, and depth. Visually stunning and completely interactive, augmented reality is the perfect vehicle for 21st century education. 4D Anatomy takes viewers inside the human body via a simple-to-use 3-dimensional learning environment. Perfect for use in the classroom, or anytime.How to Use 4D Anatomy:1. Download the 4D Anatomy App from the Apple Appstore or Google Play. 2. Once the app has downloaded onto the device, tap the app to open it.3. Print Target	TapâOptionsâ in upper left hand corner	Select a method of sending the target to yourself        Print the target out, or display it on the screen of another device4. Lay printed Target on flat surface with sufficient lighting5. Point device at Target and model should appear6. Zooming In and Out	Place two fingers on device	âPinchingâ will cause the model to zoom out	âPullingâ will cause the model to zoom in        Double tap with one finger to return the model to it's original size7. Changing the model	Tap âOptionsâ in top left hand corner	Tap âMaleâ or âFemaleâ to switch genders	Tap âCloseâ to close the âoptionsâ tab

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works perfect the first time. A nice program to use and enjoy. Thanks!
reviews.author: Tim Driver

reviews.title: Beautifully made..
reviews.comment: This is an awesome concept. I\'d love to see more of their work. Honestly a very awesomr app.
reviews.author: Francis Rivarez

reviews.title: Awesomest app for learning
reviews.comment: Most people who have given bad reviews surely havent read the instructions carefully.... its super awesome.... must have app for anatomy learners... its like having your own personal dead body for studying.... loved it <3
reviews.author: Hafiz Muhammad Aeymon

reviews.title: Nice...
reviews.comment: A great app, u need to elaborate a bit more n instructions though.I almost uninstalled it b4 I read some helpful reviews
reviews.author: Hasika Jayasekara

reviews.title: Excellent app
reviews.comment: Don\'t be intimidated by the low rating: if you know how to read instructions and love to be amazed by technology every day, you won\'t regret the free download.
reviews.author: Julian Pani

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: love it! SO cool. (READ THE DESCRIPTION PEOPLE.) would be better if it didn\'t turn everything back on after losing sight of the target.
reviews.author: Morgan Metcalf

reviews.title: Great concept Thanx a lot
reviews.comment: Its a great concept to use and it really helps . and I understand its still in early development but it still lacks some extra features ..and it would be better if you put one of your YouTube videos in the app description it would help people to get familiar with the idea
reviews.author: Sari Al Shammari

reviews.title: Save confusion!
reviews.comment: Go to Daqri site, products, click 4D Anatomy scroll down to \"how to use\" look for \"here\" link brings up required image then right click image & \"save page as\" to a desktop folder. Look for \"target_4D_anatomy.png\" (1.75Mb ) then save it & print as needed aim device at then hey presto it works!!
reviews.author: Ian Hare

reviews.title: Sucks to the core
reviews.comment: Nothing of medical importance in this app Starts with a camera and lot of options,which will do nothing with name that indicate the app Totally disappointed
reviews.author: AnwarHussain T

reviews.title: So cool, yet so limited
reviews.comment: Cool interface, great concept. But it so hard to use. It also doesnt offer much that other apps dont. Its more of a cool toy. Also, not tutorial and very limited controls.
reviews.author: Josh McGehee

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: This app is amazing. Limited use for me but it\'s still amazing to play with. Instructions to print the \'target\' are vague, from the app I emailed the \'target\' to my pc, saved the attachment to my desktop then printed it, easy when you know how ;-) HTC one
reviews.author: Charlotte Jones

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: This is a most excellent app. What developers are doing is brilliant the possibilities are endless once the hardware catches up to the developers. One but a very small but, description of how to use needs to be better maybe some diagrams or a YouTube video of someone using app. Great work.
reviews.author: Aidan Reilly

reviews.title: Print the background from daqri 1st!
reviews.comment: Way too freeking cool! I love this! My lab partners will flip and want to know where to get this app! It is confusing at first because I didnt realize I needed the background, u can make this app work once u pull up or print the background. My only wish would be an option to save the background and be able to pull it up in the program to use like a basic view. Very very cool once u get used to it, I absolutly love that I can hover anterior or from the patients left or right side and the program adjust to show that angle as if it were a doll being turned left and right. Thankyou so much daqri, this really helps AP students with understanding structures. Would there be a way to apply a layer for identification or personal notation later?
reviews.author: Jess Teren

reviews.title: Best for study.
reviews.comment: Great Academic Utility.
reviews.author: dr.anandkumar patel

reviews.title: Cool!
reviews.comment: Instructions could be a little more obvious (ie part of the download). But very clever app!  Would like to be able to flip body onto the front!
reviews.author: Tracy Hickson

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: ahmadi erik

reviews.title: Crashes
reviews.comment: Crashes on s4. Fix bug. Cant even load
reviews.author: Regardt Van Zanten

reviews.title: \342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205\342\230\205 An Extra Five for Daqri
reviews.comment: My hat is really off to you. Daqri is a phenomenal application, presenting a platform that has a most incredible and awesome potential, that will carry us way beyond the limit of our present imaginations. Joe \"MillenniumDad\" Lippo
reviews.author: Joseph Lippo

reviews.title: 4D Anatomy
reviews.comment: Wow, fantastic,fabulous. My mum downloaded picture to her phone and was able to show me human anatomy. She thought it was a superb app. Is there a map app using Daqri images? If not there should be.
reviews.author: Hannah Defoe-Faissal

reviews.title: Neat app, big potential.
reviews.comment: I like it, although anatomy isn\'t my thing. I\'d like to see a vehicle engine or car break down with this technology.
reviews.author: Mikey Crain
